word: My brother, you need not feel that you are too old to train your voice.  You talk in too low a tone.  Open your mouth and use your abdominal muscles in sending forth the sound.  Just now you are excellently situated for learning to talk clearly and distinctly.  When talking to the workmen, take in deep inspirations, and let your tones be full and round.  Thus you will gain in health. Your delivery will improve, and your efforts to help the people will be crowned with success....
